item.title: Release 3.4.1 available
item.description: This is a release of Apache Hadoop 3.4.1 line.

item.title: Release 3.4.0 available
item.description: This is the first release of Apache Hadoop 3.4 line. It contains 2888 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 3.3.

item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.9 line. It contains 204 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 2.9.1.

item.title: Release 2.8.5 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.8 line. It contains 33 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 2.8.5.

item.title: Release 3.1.1 available
item.description: This is the first stable release of Apache Hadoop 3.1 line. It contains 435 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 3.1.0.

item.title: Release 2.7.7 available
item.description: This is a maintenance release of Apache Hadoop 2.7. It addresses CVE-2018-8009.

item.title: Release 3.0.3 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 3.0 line. It contains 249 bug fixes, improvments and other enhancements since 3.0.2.

item.title: Release 2.8.4 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.8 line. It contains 77 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 2.8.3.

item.title: Release 2.9.1 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.9 line. It contains 208 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 2.9.0.

item.title: Release 3.0.2 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 3.0 line. This release fixes the shard jars published in Hadoop 3.0.1.

item.title: Release 2.7.6 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.7 line.

item.title: Release 3.1.0 available
item.description: This is the first release of Apache Hadoop 3.1 line. It contains 768 bug fixes, improvements and enhancements since 3.0.0

item.title: Release 3.0.1 available
item.description: After four alpha releases and one beta release, 3.0.0 is generally available. 3.0.0 consists of 302 bug fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since 3.0.0-beta1. All together, 6242 issues were fixed as part of the 3.0.0 release series since 2.7.0.

item.title: Release 2.9.0 available
item.description: This is the first GA release in the 2.9 release line. It includes 30 New Features with 500+ subtasks, 407 Improvements, 790 Bug fixes new fixed issues since 2.8.2. For major features and improvements for Apache Hadoop 2.8.2 please refer: overview of major changes. For details of 790 bug fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since the previous 2.8.2 release, please check: release notes and changelog

item.title: Release 2.7.5 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.7 line.

item.title: Release 3.0.0 generally available
item.description: After four alpha releases and one beta release, 3.0.0 is generally available. 3.0.0 consists of 302 bug fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since 3.0.0-beta1. All together, 6242 issues were fixed as part of the 3.0.0 release series since 2.7.0.

item.title: Release 2.8.3 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.8 release line. It contains 79 bug fixes, improvments and other enhancements since 2.8.2.

item.title: Release 2.8.2 available
item.description: This is the first GA release in the 2.8 release line. It contains 315 bug fixes, improvments and other enhancements since 2.8.1. For major features and improvements for Apache Hadoop 2.8, please refer: overview of major changes. For details of 315 fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since the previous 2.8.1 release, please check: release notes and changelog

item.title: Release 3.0.0-beta1 available
item.description: This is the first beta release in the 3.0.0 release line. It consists of 576 bug fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since 3.0.0-alpha4. This is planned to be the final alpha release, with the next release being 3.0.0 GA.

item.title: Release 2.7.4 available
item.description: This is the next release of Apache Hadoop 2.7 line.

item.title: Release 3.0.0-alpha4 available
item.description: This is the fourth alpha release in the 3.0.0 release line. It consists of 814 bug fixes, improvements, and other enhancements since 3.0.0-alpha3. This is planned to be the final alpha release, with the next release being 3.0.0-beta1.

item.title: Release 2.8.1 available
item.description: This is a security release in the 2.8.0 release line. It consists of 2.8.0 plus security fixes. Users on 2.8.0 are encouraged to upgrade to 2.8.1.

item.title: Release 2.8.0 available
item.description: Apache Hadoop 2.8.0 contains a number of significant features and enhancements. For major features and improvements, please refer: overview of major changes coming in 2.8.0. For details of 2917 fixes, improvements, and new features since the previous 2.7.0 release, please check: release notes and changelog

item.title: Release 3.0.0-alpha2
item.description: This is the second alpha in a series of planned alphas and betas leading up to a 3.0.0 GA release. The intention is to “release early, release often” to quickly iterate on feedback collected from downstream users.

item.title: Release 2.6.5 available
item.description: A point release for the 2.6 line.

item.title: Release 3.0.0-alpha1 available
item.description: This is the first alpha in a series of planned alphas and betas leading up to a 3.0.0 GA release. The intention is to “release early, release often” to quickly iterate on feedback collected from downstream users.

item.title: Release 2.7.3 available
item.description: Please see the Hadoop 2.7.3 Release Notes for the list of 221 bug fixes and patches since the previous release 2.7.2.

item.description: Apache Hadoop 2.6.1 is a point release in the 2.6.x release line, and fixes a lot of critical issues in 2.6.0.

item.title: Release 2.7.1 (stable) available
item.description: A point release for the 2.7 line. This release is now considered stable.

item.title: Release 0.23.4 available
item.description: A point release for the 0.23.X line. Most notably this release now incluses support for upgrading a 1.X HDFS cluster with append/synch enabled.

item.description: This is a beta release for version 1.1.

item.title: Release 0.23.3 available
item.description: This release contains YARN and MRv2 but does not have Name Node High Avalability

item.title: Release 1.0.2 available
item.description: This is a bug fix release for version 1.0.

item.title: Release 1.0.1 available
item.description: This is a bug fix release for version 1.0. This release is now considered stable, replacing the long-standing 0.20.203.

item.title: release 0.23.1 available
item.description: This is the second alpha version of the hadoop-0.23 major release after the first alpha 0.23.0. This release has significant improvements compared to 0.23.0 but should still be considered as alpha-quality and not for production use.

item.title: release 1.0.0 available
item.description: After six years of gestation, Hadoop reaches 1.0.0! This release is from the 0.20-security code line, and includes support for:

item.title: release 0.22.0 available
item.description: This release contains many bug fixes and optimizations compared to its predecessor 0.21.0. See the Hadoop 0.22.0 Release Notes for details. Alternatively, you can look at the complete change log for this release

item.title: release 0.23.0 available
item.description: This is the alpha version of the hadoop-0.23 major release. This is the first release we’ve made off Apache Hadoop trunk in a long while. This release is alpha-quality and not yet ready for serious use.

item.title: release 0.20.205.0 available
item.description: This release contains improvements, new features, bug fixes and optimizations. This release includes rpms and debs, all duly checksummed and securely signed.

item.title: release 0.20.204.0 available
item.description: This release contains improvements, new features, bug fixes and optimizations. This release includes rpms and debs for the first time.

item.title: release 0.20.203.0 available
item.description: This release contains many improvements, new features, bug fixes and optimizations. It is stable and has been deployed in large (4,500 machine) production clusters.

item.title: release 0.21.0 available
item.description: This release contains many improvements, new features, bug fixes and optimizations. It has not undergone testing at scale and should not be considered stable or suitable for production. This release is being classified as a minor release, which means that it should be API compatible with 0.20.2.

item.description: This release contains several critical bug fixes.

item.title: release 0.19.1 available
item.description: This release contains many critical bug fixes, including some data loss issues. The release also introduces an incompatible change by disabling the file append API (HADOOP-5224) until it can be stabilized.
